divs: Sighting Detailsoutside grilling the 2nd time. Saw very bright light 1st time. I believed it was a ufo. The object stayed in vacinity for about 3 min. it hovered and rotated a light that was white and disappeared from sight.
Summary: this appearance is the 1st of 2. 2 nights in a row in same area same description both nights same time it stayed in area .
trends: There have been no other sightings in Columbiana
This sighting has never been favorited.
